header.author: Cromwell Mortimer
header.title: Some Experiments concerning the Poisonous Quality of the Simple Water Distilled from the Lauro-Cerasus, or Common Laurel, Made upon Dogs, at Toppingo-Hall in Essex, August the 24th 1731. and Others Made before the Royal Society in Their Repository. By Cromwell Mortimer, M. D. R. S. Secret
